about_the_game:
The night of fire stealing 2

This game is the second work of The night of fire stealing series. This is a Retro RPG game. No maps, no directions. It tells the story of the encounter between the administrator and the old ones in the eastern TianTang City.

plot

The plot of this work is inherited from the previous work. In 2019, the player will play the protagonist Yan Yue and witness the contradiction between the administrator and the old gods from his perspective. This supposed peaceful modern city is facing a huge crisis
Together with the administrator to solve these crises, with the old ones of the universe to make an end.

game playing and operation

The round operation of 4-person team is adopted. By clicking on the ground with the mouse, the movement power is consumed to move in the maze. One attack or one use of props will consume all the movement power. The props of skills and equipment are released by using the specified keys on the keyboard

underground labyrinth

In the underground maze, you can't save outside the designated save point. If all the members of the team are killed, you will be judged dead. You can only read the previous archive and start over again. With the progress of the game, you can unlock more maps and more enemies

About some sensitive content

The game may contain some sensitive content, including minor pornography and violence. If you don't like the content, please don't buy the game

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains minor pornographic or violent content. However, considering the nature of the game, this game is suitable for normal players over 18 years old. The game does not include sexual abuse / involuntary sex, drug / alcohol abuse or self harm.
